  • Classes in org.neo4j.scheduler used by org.neo4j.batchinsert.internal 
    Class Description
    JobScheduler
    To be expanded, the idea here is to have a database-global service for running jobs, handling jobs crashing and so on.
  • Classes in org.neo4j.scheduler used by org.neo4j.bolt 
    Class Description
    JobScheduler
    To be expanded, the idea here is to have a database-global service for running jobs, handling jobs crashing and so on.
  • Classes in org.neo4j.scheduler used by org.neo4j.bolt.runtime.scheduling 
    Class Description
    Group
    Represents a common group of jobs, defining how they should be scheduled.
    JobScheduler
    To be expanded, the idea here is to have a database-global service for running jobs, handling jobs crashing and so on.
    SchedulerThreadFactory
    Thread factories used by the JobScheduler need to be able to create both normal threads, and ForkJoinWorkerThreads.

  • Classes in org.neo4j.scheduler used by org.neo4j.scheduler 
    Class Description
    ActiveGroup  
    CallableExecutor
    Extends Executor to make it more similar to ExecutorService but without possibility to shut down.
    CancelListener
    Gets notified about calls to JobHandle.cancel().
    ExecutorServiceFactory
    Implementations of this interface are used by the JobHandle implementation to create the underlying ExecutorServices that actually run the scheduled jobs.
    ExecutorServiceFactory.ExecutorServiceAdapter  
    FailedJobRun  
    Group
    Represents a common group of jobs, defining how they should be scheduled.
    JobHandle  
    JobMonitoringParams  
    JobType  
    MonitoredJobExecutor
    Like Executor, executes submitted tasks.
    MonitoredJobInfo  
    MonitoredJobInfo.State  
    SchedulerThreadFactory
    Thread factories used by the JobScheduler need to be able to create both normal threads, and ForkJoinWorkerThreads.
    SchedulerThreadFactoryFactory
